Collection of [curried][currying] [functional][functional-programming] utils made entirely in [TypeScript][typescript]. Compatible with all modern JS environments: - üì¶ [Node.js][nodejs]. - ü¶ï [Deno][deno]. - üåé Browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Edge, and so on). ## Usage This package can be installed as a dependency or used directly. ### Usage as ECMAScript module In JS or [Deno][deno]: ```js import { isObject } from "https://esm.sh/@vangware/utils"; ``` Or in HTML: ```html ``` ### Usage with local installation First: ```bash npm i @vangware/utils ``` And then: ```js import { isObject } from "@vangware/utils"; ``` ## Documentation Documentation can be found [HERE][documentation]. It is auto-generated with [typedoc][typedoc] based on the JSDocs and the types in the source. Shouldn't be necessary to read this, code editors like [VSCode][vscode] integrate the documentation in the UI. ## Changelog Changelog can be found [HERE][changelog]. ## Test coverage Test coverage can be found [HERE][coverage].
